titles: A Defence of the Brief history of the Unitarians, against Dr. Sherlock's answer in his Vindication of the Holy Trinity
author: Allix, Pierre, 1641-1717.
notes: Has been incorrectly attributed to Pierre Allix. Cf. BM.
This item also appears at reel 344:13 as part of: The faith of one God. London, 1691 (Wing F258B).
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
keywords: Nye, Stephen, 1648?-1719. --  Brief history of the Unitarians.
Sherlock, William, 1641?-1707. --  Vindication of the doctrine of the holy and ever blessed Trinity.
